boardgame.name: Dreadfleet
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For two bleak decades the Undead reavers of Count Noctilus have plagued the oceans of the world. After each raid, the Dreadfleet disappears into its lair as quickly and silently as it appeared, far from the reach of Man. And yet there remains hope. Captain Jaego Roth of the Heldenhammer has vowed to hunt down and destroy Count Noctilus and his Undead captains once and for all. With him sail the most notorious and cunning of the pirate lords of Sartosa, each borne to battle upon a giant warship bristling with cannons, organ guns and bolt throwers. At the stroke of midnight on Geheimnisnacht, most forsaken of nights, the Heldenhammer and her companions sail into the realm of undeath known as the Galleon's Graveyard. One by one, Count Noctilus and his vile allies move in to stop them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dreadfleet is a boxed game for two (or more) players that includes everything you need to make war on the turbulent seas of the Warhammer world. At your command are two fleets of ships: the Dreadfleet led by the Vampire Count Noctilus, aboard his gargantuan sea-hulk the Bloody Reaver; and the Grand Alliance commanded by the Pirate Captain Jaego Roth, who recently stole the Heldenhammer _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; the pride of the Imperial Fleet, and one of the largest galleons to ever sail the high seas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As your ships engage in furious battle, it's down to you, the fleet captain, to make important split-second decisions. Do you bring all guns to bear on the closest enemy warship, or do you sail into position for a furious broadside? What happens when the warship catches fire, or worse, the powder kegs ignite? Exactly how much punishment can your warship take before it sinks without a trace? Are those Undead seagulls or flying piranha fish? And, when all else fails, do you have the courage to ram your foe, board their ship, and engage them in a duel to the death?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: D6G Ep 90: Dreadfleet Detailed Review _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Goodbye Hollywood

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** DREADFLEETN: $99.95 (pre-order) Games Workshop [GW DF0160] Publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Announced Release Date: October 1, 2011 *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $14.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD

Games Workshop Ltd. (GAW DF0160) For two bleak decades the Undead reavers of Count Noctilus have plagued the oceans of the world. After each raid, the Dreadfleet disappears into its lair as quickly and silently as it appeared, far from the reach of Man. And yet there remains hope. Captain Jaego Roth of the Heldenhammer has vowed to hunt down and destroy Count Noctilus and his Undead captains once and for all. With him sail the most notorious and cunning of the pirate lords of Sartosa, each borne to battle upon a giant warship bristling with cannons, organ guns and bolt throwers. At the stroke of midnight on Geheimnisnacht, most forsaken of nights, the Heldenhammer and her companions sail into the realm of undeath known as the Galleon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Graveyard. One by one, Count Noctilus and his vile allies move in to stop them. Dreadfleet is a boxed game for two (or more) players that includes everything you need to make war on the turbulent seas of the Warhammer world. At your command are two fleets of ships: the Dreadfleet led by the Vampire Count Noctilus, aboard his gargantuan sea-hulk the Bloody Reaver; and the Grand Alliance commanded by the Pirate Captain Jaego Roth, who recently stole the Heldenhammer - the pride of the Imperial Fleet, and one of the largest galleons to ever sail the high seas. As your ships engage in furious battle, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s down to you, the fleet captain, to make important split-second decisions. Do you bring all guns to bear on the closest enemy warship, or do you sail into position for a furious broadside? What happens when the warship catches fire, or worse, the powder kegs ignite? Exactly how much punishment can your warship take before it sinks without a trace? Are those Undead seagulls or flying piranha fish? And, when all else fails, do you have the courage to ram your foe, board their ship, and engage them in a duel to the death?

Games Workshop Ltd. (GAW DF0160) For two bleak decades the Undead reavers of Count Noctilus have plagued the oceans of the world. After each raid, the Dreadfleet disappears into its lair as quickly and silently as it appeared, far from the reach of Man. And yet there remains hope. Captain Jaego Roth of the Heldenhammer has vowed to hunt down and destroy Count Noctilus and his Undead captains once and for all. With him sail the most notorious and cunning of the pirate lords of Sartosa, each borne to battle upon a giant warship bristling with cannons, organ guns and bolt throwers. At the stroke of midnight on Geheimnisnacht, most forsaken of nights, the Heldenhammer and her companions sail into the realm of undeath known as the Galleon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Graveyard. One by one, Count Noctilus and his vile allies move in to stop them. Dreadfleet is a boxed game for two (or more) players that includes everything you need to make war on the turbulent seas of the Warhammer world. At your command are two fleets of ships: the Dreadfleet led by the Vampire Count Noctilus, aboard his gargantuan sea-hulk the Bloody Reaver; and the Grand Alliance commanded by the Pirate Captain Jaego Roth, who recently stole the Heldenhammer - the pride of the Imperial Fleet, and one of the largest galleons to ever sail the high seas. As your ships engage in furious battle, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s down to you, the fleet captain, to make important split-second decisions. Do you bring all guns to bear on the closest enemy warship, or do you sail into position for a furious broadside? What happens when the warship catches fire, or worse, the powder kegs ignite? Exactly how much punishment can your warship take before it sinks without a trace? Are those Undead seagulls or flying piranha fish? And, when all else fails, do you have the courage to ram your foe, board their ship, and engage them in a duel to the death?

All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** DREADFLEETN: $99.95 (pre-order) Games Workshop [GW DF0160] Arrival Date at CLS Games = October 4, 2011 *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $14.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD

**For BGG user Robbage** Professionally painted by a local artist. (Main set photo was taken by local artist.) Played twice, in excellent condition. When it wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t being played, it was stored in customized foam trays for protection. This lot includes the plastic miniatures (10 warships with scenic bases, 7 cog auxiliaries, 1 dragon auxiliary, 1 dirigible axillary, 7 islands, 5 shipwreck pieces, 3 sea monsters, 5 treasure tokens, 1 wind gauge, 2 ship_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wheels, and 1 navigation rod - all assembled and painted), game cards, original dice (as well as some Chessex dice), fabric seascape gaming mat, rulebook, a copy of the White Dwarf issue that discussed the game, a copy of a scenario that was included in a later issue of White Dwarf, and the original game box. It also includes 3 customized Battle Foam trays to hold all painted pieces, accessories, rulebook, etc. Additional photos are available upon request. Nothing missing or damaged.
For Mndwrm only - do not purchase unless this is you.

Dreadfleet by Games Workshop Ltd *Like new/Unplayed partially assembled/painted to high standard* -Game unplayed, cards still in shrink -4 minis painted to a high standard, 2 small bits come off but easy fix to glue back (see pictures) -Minis organised and packaged into individual bags for easy assemply/painting -I will package the game in boxed/waterproofed packaging and send via tracked delivery -From a smoke _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; pet free home P.S. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m having a clearout! See my other games, I will combine shipping whenever possible.
Models are cleanly assembled but not primed or painted, and come with Battle-Foam custom inserts which hold the models safely in the original box.

Mint in shrink

This is the Dreadfleet miniatures game with about 50% of the ships and terrain painted to a high quality. This also includes the Battlefoam inserts where all the ships have been kept since being built. This box is obviously opened but has never been played and in Like New condition.
